QuestData.Title: Who's Next?
QuestData.Description:
Aha! Well, it seems that another gnoll has stepped up to assume command. Just as I expected. Yes.
Having a trusted vice-warlord to ensure continuation of government makes perfect sense now, doesn't it? We'll just have to hit them a little harder to tumble their bureaucracy, hm?
What? Am I going to take this moment to reflect on whether I'm rushing to judgement on these gnolls? Ridiculous! They're gnolls!
Quickly now! Kill Cracktooth before the iron cools off or they arrange for an election!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: How many hyenas can one gnoll have, anyway?
QuestData.RewardText: Ha! Maybe next time they'll think twice before electing a new leader!
